name: xensiv-angle-sensor-tlx5012-ino
keywords: hall, sensor, magnetic, sensor2go, XENSIV, TLE5012B, TLI5012B
description: This library enables the Infineon XENSIV TLx5012B magnetic angle sensor. The XENSIV TLx5012B is a pre-calibrated 360Â° angle sensor to detect magnetic fields. The sensor is available as Sens2go kit as well as bulk chip.
